data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Bijapur, Karnataka, India to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Bijapur, Karnataka, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who are far from you in Bijapur. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the county of Bijapur.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Bijapur, Karnataka, India.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Dhangar Bharwad people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Spirit, please convict each believer in Bijapur, Karnataka, India to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 2,153,350 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Bijapur, Karnataka, India to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.

data.section_summary:
the county of Bijapur, Karnataka, India has a population of 2,177,300.

We estimate Bijapur has 23,950 people who might know Jesus, 26,418 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,126,932 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the county of Bijapur against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.
